title: WW Dance Bug

embed.title: Death Dance Warwick Bug Patch 5.6
embed.description: I just found this awsome ww dance bug at the end of the game isnt t awsome XD

body:
Theres a Bug where you can Dance when u got Guardians.
U need 2 press control + 4 in the end while u are dead and recover with guardians its a pretty funny bug ^^.
